title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
preparation: 1. Cook the spaghetti. Fry the bacon. Mix the eggs and cheese. Combine all together with the spaghetti and serve.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
preparation: 1. Grill the chicken. Make the tomato gravy. Combine the chicken with the gravy. Serve with rice or naan.
